name: downline
description: A cross-platform video and audio downloader for YouTube, Vimeo, Dailymotion, SoundCloud and many other sites

scripts.build:all: npm run build:win & npm run build:linux & npm run build:mac & wait
scripts.postbuild:win: cd "./dist/win" && mv *.exe ../../releases/downline-$npm_package_version-setup-windows.exe && mv win-unpacked downline && 7z a -mx=9 downline-$npm_package_version-portable-windows.7z downline && mv *.7z ../../releases/
scripts.postbuild:linux: cd "./dist/linux" && mv *.AppImage ../../releases/downline-$npm_package_version-appimage-linux.AppImage && mv linux-unpacked downline && tar -cJf downline-$npm_package_version-portable-linux.tar.xz downline && mv *.tar.xz ../../releases/

author: Arjun B <https://github.com/jarbun>
